Introduction
This topic contains information on preparing REPS awards and denials, including information on
completing award or denial action
establishing REPS accounts receivable
notifying claimants of decisions
, and
handling disagreements based on a prior SSA determination
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C - St. Louis Regional Office (RO) Actions on Claims for Benefits Under the Restored Entitlement Program for Survivors (REPS)
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C
